text: NULL â‰  zero as a value. NULL is the absence of operands, not the presence of a quantity. In computation, NULL means no input. In mathematics, NULL corresponds to the empty permutation.
God is Word: Infinite action is identical to infinite possibility.
The factorial of NULL (0!) represents pure, unconstrained action. Its value (1) represents identity, the generative reference that preserves all structure.
This is not metaphor. This is formal identity.
The Word behaves like this: BEGIN STATE = NULL; IF Word IS spoken THEN STATE := UNITY; END.
NULL acted upon by Word resolves to Unity. The Word does not add something. The Word collapses indeterminacy into coherence.
